title: Lynda.com - FileMaker Pro 10 Essential Training
description:
FileMaker Pro 10 is the world's leading easy-to-use database software <a href="
http://www.filemaker.com/products/filemaker-pro/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.filemaker.com/products/filemaker-pro/</a>



Video Tutorial



FileMaker Pro 10 Essential Training
with: Cris Ippolite


From organization comes efficiency, and with efficiency, creativity can flourish. To help users create more efficient workflows, Cris Ippolite introduces the new features and basic functions of FileMaker Pro 10. In FileMaker Pro 10 Essential Training, Cris explains why this desktop database application is used by everyone from Fortune 500 companies to individuals. He demonstrates how databases work, how to manage information and understand its relationships, and how to work with calculated fields. Cris also shows how to import and export information, share results, and build interesting and attractive reports. Exercise files accompany the course for premium subscribers.



**PLEASE NOTE:  THIS TORRENT INCLUDES BOTH VIDEO TUTORIAL AND EXERCISE FILES**



Topics include:

Introduction
Getting Started
Database Creation Essentials
Managing Fields
Auto-Enter Field Options
Validation and Storage Field Options
Working with Records
Creating Layouts
Working with Layouts
Formatting Layout Objects
Web Viewer Essentials
Finding Data
Sorting Data
Value Lists
Printing and Saving
Reports
Importing/Exporting
Calculation Essentials
Script Essentials
Script Triggers 
Relationships
Portals
Using Multiple Windows
Securing Files
Conclusion


For more info (and video samples) please see: <a href=" http://www.lynda.com/home/DisplayCourse.aspx?lpk2=638" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.lynda.com/home/DisplayCourse.aspx?lpk2=638</a>


Enjoy!
